VistaLink for Nokia NSP NFM-P
The VistaLink for Nokia NSP NFM-P Solution provides a pre-
built interface between the Nokia NSP NFM-P server
platform and the VistaFoundation.
NFM-P (Network Functions Manager for Packet) is the Nokia
NSP (Network Services Platform) module for IP/MPLS (Multi
Protocol Label Switching) management.
Nokia NSP NFM-P is a network management system used to
manage devices, such as the Nokia routers, OmniSwitches,
optical and microwave devices. VistaLink for Nokia NSP NFM-
P enables to monitor the devices managed by the Nokia NSP
NFM-P.
Roles and responsibilities:
Role involves research and end to end development for the
product VistaLinks for NSP NFM-P.
The tasks include new feature additions in the existing
product, development related to new product versions, bug
ﬁxing, documentation, unit testing and Customer Ticket
Resolution, proﬁling and sizing of the product.
Technology: Java, ActiveMQ, SOAP, JMS, KAFKA, Rest,
JavaScript, XML, JSON, Log4j, Maven, ANT, Swing.
